thread.title: Cute boutique property with lovely views
thread.title_full: Cute boutique property with lovely views - Review of Hotel de l'Empereur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lalaha
title: Cute boutique property with lovely views
text:
Had a lovely stay here, complete with a stunning view of Les Invalides from our bed. It was a medium sized room with comfortable queen bed and soft linens, adequate storage space and in-room safe, walk-in shower with rainhead and handheld nozzles, plus heated towel rack. The toilet is in a separate room across the living space from the shower and sink room, though. The wifi was free and pretty reliable.
The hotel is in a VERY quiet section of the 7th, within three blocks of the Tour Maubourg metro stop and an easy walk to Rue Cler and the Eiffel Tower. Most of the staff was helpful and kind, too. I would definitely stay here again!
